description:
These patches form an airtight, watertight repair that remains flexible in extreme temperatures and protects against abrasion, moisture, saltwater, and UV damage.

  • Sticks to canvas and fabrics, rubber, neoprene, plastics, polyurethane, non-oiled leather, aluminum, and stainless steel
  • Functions from -29 to 60°C
  • One 7.7 x 30.5cm patch
  • One 3.5 x 3.5cm patch
  • One 2.2 x 2.2cm patch
  • 30.5cm reinforcement filament
  • Alcohol prep pads
  • Instructions and product repair list
name: TearRepair Tear-Aid Repair Patch Type A
